name: Try-Not-to-Laugh Challenge
description: Kate from the Bloodhound Family found a strange dream bubble and invites you to join a trial called "Try-Not-to-Laugh Challenge." Needless to say, this must have something to do with the "Masked Fools"...
introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Kate from the Bloodhound Family found a strange dream bubble and invites you to take part in a trial called "Try-Not-to-Laugh Challenge." Needless to say, this must have something to do with the "Masked Fools"...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● A total of 7 Challenges will be unlocked during the event period.
● As the Equilibrium Level increases, enemy levels will also increase.

◆ Gameplay Intro ◆
● In Challenge Stages, a Surprise Box will be added to the Action Order. When activated, it opens to reveal Surprise Gifts that aid you in combat.
● As you progress through Challenge Stages, more characters will become Comedians and join the battle.
● Comedians can increase the types of Surprise Gifts in the Surprise Box, while also increasing the Giggle Gauge of the Surprise Box. The higher the points, the stronger the effects.
● Comedians also come with new Talent abilities, bringing different combat experiences.
● During the challenge, if the Giggle Gauge reaches the specified level, and you defeat the specified wave of enemies before the Cycle ends, you'll receive a higher rating.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event period, rewards can be claimed via Limited-Time Rewards upon achieving specific challenge goals within the stages.
